name: promises
description: - In [app-synchronous](app-synchronous.js), a synchronous approach is used to calculate the sum of a large array, employing a loop with a time delay.   - [app-promise-with-httprequest](app-promise-with-httprequest.js) demonstrates asynchronous programming by fetching a random dog image URL using the XMLHttpRequest API and handling the response with Promises.   - [app-asynchronous](app-asynchronous.js) showcases asynchronous computation using Promises and setTimeout to perform the sum calculation in chunks while allowing other tasks to execute.
